content: This one could be quite interesting to mathematicians as well https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/issues/1962

I didn't get into how exactly this should translate to Sets. It could either be implicit or explicit as in e.g. {a..b}... assuming that no-one will ever want to create a set literal containing ranges as elements.
It would be great if this syntax could be unified with Ioo/Ico/Iio sets somehow
this seems to be on the radar but I'm not sure exactly how the proposal accomodates them
Didn't my second message above at least start to address that? :laughing:
We have a start on this over at branch#fin_range
